doc.title: Шопска Салата (Shopska Salad)
doc.abstract: It is consisted of Tomatos, Cheese,Cucumbers,Oil,Onion,Parsley. Suitable to be consumed with Bulgarian Rakia/Vodka

doc.title: Пица Тропикана (Pizza Tropicana)
doc.abstract: It is consisted of Tomatos, Cheese,Beef steak,mushrooms,Edam,Oregano,Pineapple. Best to be consumed with Stela Artois - Beer
